subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: It was exhausting, exhilarating, and occasionally excruciating, but after Wednesday night's triple overtime victory, the Knicks now have a winning record for the first time in 665 days.
snippet: It was exhausting, exhilarating, and occasionally excruciating, but after Wednesday night's triple overtime victory, the Knicks now have a winning record for the first time in 665 days.
